message_1: What is the balanced chemical equation for the reaction between potassium iodide and lead (II) nitrate to form solid lead iodide and aqueous potassium nitrate?
message_2:
The balanced chemical equation for the reaction between potassium iodide (KI) and lead (II) nitrate (Pb(NO3)2) to form solid lead iodide (PbI2) and aqueous potassium nitrate (KNO3) is:

2 KI (aq) + Pb(NO3)2 (aq) â†’ PbI2 (s) + 2 KNO3 (aq)
